thread.section_title: Any Assembly Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Any Assembly | anyassembly.com
thread.title: Pablo Cantero
thread.title_full: Any Assembly reviewed by Pablo Cantero

author: Pablo Cantero
title: Pablo Cantero
text: I used Any Assembly recently to assemble most of my bedroom and living room furniture. Everything worked well, except my bed. My bed has three height levels, the lowest is meant for using with a box spring, which I am not, and they assembled it in the lowest one. I noticed that the mattress was very low, kind of uncomfortable, but I thought that it was a bad bed from Ikea (Hemnes), but after researching on it, the bed is actually good, the issue was with the height level used (lowest). Anyway, I changed it to the second one, and now it's ok, but I had to spend some time on it, which was not the initial idea when I hired them. Besides that, everything worked well.
